sentences.en: I doubt I'll ever get rich, but I get job satisfaction.
sentences.cn: 我想我永远都不会富有，但是我在工作上很有满足感。

sentences.en: Liver and kidney are particularly rich in vitamin A.
sentences.cn: 肝脏和肾脏富含维生素A。

sentences.en: one of the richest women in America
sentences.cn: 美国最富有的女人之一

sentences.en: Only the extremely rich could afford to lunch at the Mirabelle.
sentences.cn: 只有非常有钱的人才能在米拉贝勒餐厅吃得起午餐。

sentences.en: Over the same period trade protection has increased in the rich countries.
sentences.cn: 在同一时期，富国的贸易保护有所抬头。

sentences.en: Red meat is a rich source of iron.
Rego's work is a rich collage of 20th-century painting styles.
sentences.cn: 瑞格的作品糅合了20世纪各种绘画风格。

sentences.en: Rich mineral deposits have been found in the sea bed.
sentences.cn: 海底发现有丰富的矿床。

sentences.en: Sloane used inside diplomatic information to make himself rich.
sentences.cn: 斯隆利用外交内幕消息发了财。

sentences.en: The family are rich, and extremely sophisticated and cosmopolitan.
sentences.cn: 这家人很富有，老于世故，而且见多识广。

sentences.en: The sauce is thick and rich so don't bother trying to diet.
sentences.cn: 这个酱汁又浓又香，别费劲节食了。

sentences.en: The soup was thin and clear, yet mysteriously rich.
sentences.cn: 汤又稀又清，味道却出奇地浓。

sentences.en: These two buildings typify the rich extremes of Irish architecture.
sentences.cn: 这两座建筑物体现了爱尔兰建筑风格的极致多变。

sentences.en: They're waiting for the poor little rich girl to take a pratfall.
sentences.cn: 他们等着瞧那个可怜的富家小姐出丑。

sentences.en: This is a system in which the rich are taken care of and the poor are left to suffer.
sentences.cn: 这是个富人受关照，而穷人遭罪的制度。

sentences.en: We gained a rich supply of data which would normally be inaccessible.
sentences.cn: 我们得到了通常难以获取的大量数据。

sentences.en: What's it like to be seriously rich at 15?
sentences.cn: 15岁时非常富有会是怎样一种情况？

sentences.en: With nothing but his own talent, he made himself rich and famous.
sentences.cn: 他一无所有，仅靠自身才能就变得富有而出名。

sentences.en: With urbanisation the antagonism between rich and poor sharpened.
sentences.cn: 伴随着城市化的推进，贫富间的对立情绪也加剧了。

phrases.tran_cn: 富媒体；多元媒体；多功能媒体

trans.tran_cn: 富有的，肥沃的，丰富多彩的，油腻的
(Rich)人名；(丹)里克；(捷)里赫；(英、西)里奇；(葡、法)里什
